name: WildKids
detailed_description:
In WildKids, you will act as a versatile law enforcer who will pass back from the future world. In order to assist you in completing the education law enforcement, we have equipped you with a ‘time quiescent’. When it detects the energy of the bear child, it will start the static time, giving you plenty of time to prepare for the law enforcement. However, its energy is also limited. What you need to do is to use your wit to find all kinds of props from the scene to 'educate' them in a limited time, and finally let them grow into quality, responsibility, and As an ideal young man.

Instructions: harvest props by clicking the left mouse button. Drag some props to synthesize props. Drag the props to objects in the scene may also interact

Explore puzzles
You face a variety of challenges at each level, but how do you achieve your goals gradually requires the collective mobilization of your brain and eyesight

The challenge of imagination
There are many items in the game that are common in real life, but they may not be used in such a 'common' way.

Strange punishment
The punishment for Wilkids in the game is not the same, although the necessary props for punishment will be... (sorry, I'm not sure if I can get this word approved.)

The game has now completed 3 chapters with a total of 15 levels, each chapter corresponds to a bear child, in stopping them at the same time you will also face the challenge of the small game, wish you success! The warriors

The game also has some interesting small eggs, hope to bring joy to the players friends

Another point we need to make here is that the content of the game may contain more Chinese elements. So it may be difficult for players in other countries, but rest assured, it may be harder for Chinese players, after all, the game should be fair to everyone


Speech by INFITFUN:
Dear friends and friends, due to funding problems, we have only a short time to test after the completion of the development, language support may be slightly insufficient, I hope to get your understanding. If you encounter any problems during the game or have new ideas and want to share with us, please contact us in time. We will correct and improve in the fastest time.
At the same time, we also hope to get the support and recognition of the majority of players and friends. Your support is our constant update and perfection to create more interesting and more fun games.



Here we sincerely apologize again for not giving you the best game experience. We want to make a good game, and we will stick to it! Thank you for your support

short_description: This is a very serious and serious game, so in addition to the time still. Magic elements are also there! If you don't have enough nerves and a heart-like eye, be careful of the maliciousness from the WildKids! The content of this game is too real, don't imitate it easily!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: HD4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920*1080
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 3.50GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920*1080
